name: Endless City
description:
A surreal story about the god of the city.

You play as Urbs, the god of the city, who is given the quest to find someone fitting a certain description: It must be a human being whose body lives in the present, but whose soul is already in the future. Someone empathetic and ready for big changes. However, the quest turns out to be a harbinger of great danger.

A visual novel written and coded by Michal Nowakowski and illustrated by Midjourney AI. 

This game is in the early stages of development. In future updates, I will add next chapters and enhance the existing ones with new dialogue options. It is the first game I've ever published, so please be gentle.
